title: Open Channel Management - OpenChannelCurve
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic curve made for open-channel management (raw-water systems).

description.description: Property. An optional text that describes other significant information about the simulation scenario

curveType.description: Property. Enum:'DischargeCoefficient - RelativeOpening, Elevation - Discharge, C/Co - H/Ho, P/Ho, C – h/width of spillway'
curveType.enum: ['DischargeCoefficient - RelativeOpening', 'Elevation - Discharge', 'C/Co - H/Ho', 'P/Ho', 'C – h/width of spillway']

xData.description: Property. X data points for the curve

yData.description: Property. Y data points for the curve
